Uses of Class
biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2.NativeLessOptionsBuilder

  • Packages that use NativeLessOptionsBuilder 
    Package Description
    biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2
    The LessCSS Compiler compiles Less source files to CSS code.

    • Uses of NativeLessOptionsBuilder in biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2

      Methods in biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2 that return NativeLessOptionsBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.banner​(String banner)
      Sets a banner which will be inserted to a source file before the compilation.
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.compress​(boolean compress)
      Sets whether a CSS code should be compressed (default: false).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.encoding​(String encoding)
      Sets an encoding used to read source files and save generated code.
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.fileSystems​(List<FileSystemOption> fileSystems)
      Sets file systems used to fetch content of the source files.
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.globalVariables​(List<LessVariableOption> globalVariables)
      Sets global variables that can be referenced by the files (default: [].
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.ieCompatibility​(boolean ieCompatibility)
      Sets whether a CSS code should be compatible with Internet Explorer browser (default: true).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.includePaths​(List<String> includePaths)
      Sets available include paths (default: []).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.inputFile​(String input)
      Sets an input (source) file path.
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.javaScript​(boolean javaScript)
      Sets whether a compiler should allow usage of JavaScript language (default: true).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.lineNumbers​(LineNumbersValue lineNumbers)
      Sets whether a compiler should generate inline source-mapping (default: LineNumbersValue.OFF).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.modifyVariables​(List<LessVariableOption> modifyVariables)
      Sets modify variables that can overwrite variables defined in the files (default: [].
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.options​(LessOptions options)
      Sets compiler options.
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.outputFile​(File output)
      Sets an output (destination) file.
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.relativeUrls​(boolean relativeUrls)
      Sets whether a compiler should rewrite relative URLs (default: false).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.rootPath​(String rootPath)
      Sets a path which will be added to every generated import and URL in CSS code (default: null).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.silent​(boolean silent)
      Sets whether a compiler shouldn't log compilation warnings (default: false).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.sourceMapBasePath​(String basePath)
      Sets a path that will be removed from each of the Less file paths inside the Source Map and also from the path to the map file specified in your output CSS (default: null).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.sourceMapDefault​(boolean enabled)
      Sets whether a compiler should generate a Source Map file with a default name equal to output file name with map extension (default: false).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.sourceMapFile​(File sourceMap)
      Sets whether a compiler should generate a Source Map file (default: null).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.sourceMapInline​(boolean inline)
      Sets whether a compiler should generate a Source Map and put it to CSS code (default: false).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.sourceMapLessInline​(boolean inline)
      Sets whether a compiler should include all of the Less files in to the Source Map (default: false).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.sourceMapRootPath​(String rootPath)
      Sets a path that will be prepended to each of the Less file paths inside the Source Map and also to the path to the map file specified in your output CSS (default: null).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.sourceMapUrl​(String url)
      Sets a path which will overwrite the URL in the CSS that points at the Source Map file (default: null).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.strictImports​(boolean strictImports)
      Sets whether a compiler should disallow an @import operation inside of either @media blocks or other selector blocks (default: false).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.strictMath​(boolean strictMath)
      Sets whether a compiler should try and process all maths in Less code (default: false).
      NativeLessOptionsBuilder NativeLessOptionsBuilder.strictUnits​(boolean strictUnits)
      Sets whether a compiler should guess units in Less code when it does maths (default: false).
